segments.text: Hi , Bob . Can I have the book back I lent to you last month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! I forgot all about it . Of course you can have it back , John . I'm sorry about the delay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it doesn't matter . I almost forgot it too if it is not for Peter who asked me about it this coming .
segments.speaker: S1
